name: solarus
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: Clear project description but lacks actionable getting-started content, installation steps, or any code examples.
readme.top_issue: No installation instructions in README (only reference to external compilation.txt file and website)

common_complaints: API bugs affecting game mechanics (hurt() not working, fade_in after fade_out)
Missing or incomplete features (custom grounds, shader uniforms, collision modes)
Compilation issues with different OpenGL versions
sentiment.summary: Solarus shows signs of moderate maintenance with resolved issues mixed among lingering feature requests dating back to 2014-2015, suggesting possible maintainer capacity constraints or shifting priorities.

concerns: No commits in over 7 years (last commit June 2018)
Zero closed issues in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
maintenance.summary: Solarus appears to be completely abandoned with no development activity since mid-2018 and a large backlog of unresolved issues.

analysis_summary.unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.
